author: The Film Theorists
description:
*🎲 Check out the NEW Theorist Game!*

*SUBSCRIBE to Film Theory!*
Don't miss a Film Theory! ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

KPOP Demon Hunters is one of the BIGGEST movies in the world and I already have an idea of where the sequel may be headed. There’s going to be romance, family drama, and one of them might not be making it out alive. Now, how do I know this? Guess you’ll have to watch today’s episode to find out!

title: Film Theory: Can KPOP Demon Hunters Escape Their Fate?
